custom_css: .article-template__hero-container .media,.article-template__header .media {padding-bottom: 0 !important; position: static !important; /* Ez szünteti meg a feszítést */ background: none !important;}

.article-template__hero-container img,.article-template__header img {position: static !important; max-width: 600px !important; height: auto !important; margin: 0 auto !important; width: 100% !important;}
